events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but it doesn't fit well and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under the refund cluster based on the customer's request for money back.
The case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. who specializes in refund requests for apparel.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I'm here to help you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the item has already been shipped back to us?
My order number is 45321987, and I have not sent the jacket back yet because I wanted to confirm the refund policy first.
You can return the jacket within 30 days for a full refund. Once we receive the item, we will process your refund within 5 business days.
Thank you for the information. I will send the jacket back tomorrow and look forward to receiving my refund soon.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. You should see the amount credited back to your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure you received your refund and everything is satisfactory with your case closure.
Thank you for contacting support. Since your refund has been completed successfully, we are closing this case now.
